review: There's high wait time . Appt was of 4:50 , we saw doctor at 7 pm. This is not expected from a reputed hospital. Management should not take excess appointments.

review: I have completed 13weeks of my pregnancy.**** **** **** **** ******* **** ***** **** *** *****  *** she said it's normal n not to bother after that I was asked to do blood test which was 10000 straight and early double marker test which was a bomb price again...finally I lost my after my 1st scan..n when I started bleeding they said we will chk in the next scan that is NT scan...when I felt something wrong n **** ** ***** **** *** ***** ***** ** ******* *** **** ***** **** ***** *** ******* ***** ****** * *** ** ** ******* * **** ** ***** ****** ******* * ***** *********** ******* ****** **** **** ****** **** * ******** *** ***** ****** *** ** ***** ******pls don't go by the review ** **** *** *** *** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We switched to Dr Praveena because our initial doc Dr Swapna Anand had to move to London during my wife's 3rd month of pregnancy. We already knew she was the best because of the huge queue of patients waiting for her. From then on till post delivery Dr Praveena had been extremely professional and energetic. We were guided perfectly. Being new parents we are always scared (reading too much into Google). But Dr Praveena helped us stay calm. My wife delivered a healthy baby girl via normal delivery. She is 1 month now. I can only say thank you. God bless.

Doctor is great and very friendly with a positive vibe. But the management is a chaos. Had  to wait 1.5 hours beyond the scheduled appointments and there were fights among the staffs and the patients because of this. The patients with appointments later than us were allowed to go before us which is just plain unfair.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bleeding During Pregnancy,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: i have had wonderful experience with doctor praveena. both my kids were delivered by her. she is experienced and is amazing at her work. she gives correct suggestions to have a healthy and normal delivery. her vast experience n confidence makes it look super easy fr her to handle deliveries. i will recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: During my second pregnancy,she was my gynecologist.my earlier doctor said u hav little bit complications but also said that may be in 5th month terminate pregnancy.after that I went to praveena Shenoy,after seeing my reports she told me everything is fine.i felt relax and i delivered healthy baby through normal delivery.i am very much thankful to mam.i recommend everyone go to praveena mam for any pregnancy issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********** *** **** ***** ** *********I entrusted her with my first pregnancy as i was a was a UC patient too, and she made my 1st pregnancy a beautiful journey by suggesting proper care and medication,gave birth to healthy baby in February under her care and really happy with the experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Praveena Shenoi is very warm and explains everything to patients clearly. Though she is a little short of time due to her busy schedule, still she tries to clear all doubts of patients. Best part about her is her positive attitude and the big smile on her face when she meets a patient. Thank you DOC for our Twins. May God bless you and Sir.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review: Dr. Praveena Shenoi has that rare ability to put our minds at ease on all issues. We had a pleasant experience  every time we consulted her and as rightly pointed out in most of the reviews, she tries to avoid tests and procedures unless required. Would personally thank her for prompt response at odd hours. The staff of Cloudnine old airport road have to be appreciated for their professionalism, shout out to Sophie.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** ***** *** ***** You can be rest assured that you are in the best hands. I went to her after an ectopic pregnancy and few early pregnancy miscarriage. She provided the emotional support and asked is to try normally. In contrast with an other doctor who I was previously consulting who just wanted to push me for fertility treatment. Thanks to her I had the best pregnancy and  had a great delivery experience ( normal delivery) and am a happy mother of two kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ******** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** , had visited her for pregnancy related concerns for which whomever I had consulted earlier to Dr. Praveena weren’t giving the right guidance and the moment I met Dr. Praveena through her examination and guidance I could conceive naturally and had a normal delivery. A sweet human and friendly nature with her patients that’s what I personally experienced.

I would highly recommend Dr. Praveena to any woman who is seeking the right guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am writing this review very late. We welcomed our rainbow baby last year. Before welcoming our baby, I went through multiple pregnancy loss including ectopic with one fallopian tube removed through surgery. However Dr Praveena still gave me hope to try naturally after looking at my reports. And with God's Grace I conceived naturally and Dr Praveena made sure that my pregnancy journey should go smooth by suggesting frequent scans and tests. People often complain that they don't get enough time from doctor because of her busy schedule. But Dr Praveena spent enough time with me to clear my doubts during my entire pregnancy. Really thanks doctor for taking care of me and my baby very well.
Very friendly and reassuring doctor. Her experience was easy to see in the way she handled her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Wonderful experience with Dr. Shenoi. Explains everything really well and will answer all your questions with patience. She will try to avoid surgery as much as possible and will do what's best for the patient. Will put your mind at ease. Would definitely recommend her.
Doctor is awesome, Rainbow Hospital is horrible - we arrived 15 mins ahead of the slot and we had to wait 2 hours to see the doctor - they didn’t bother to inform us about the delay

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

She spends 5 min time which is worth she answer each n every questions throughly.
God bless the doctor. 
I have never seen such doctor in my life.

review: I was made to wait for more than 1 hour despite taking the appointment. After the long wait, when the doctor finally saw me, my consultation got over within 2 minutes! Although the doctor was friendly, but what good that is if she does not have the basic time to see a patient properly? Very disappointed with the experience. Would never recommend it to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend going to Dr. Praveena Shenoi during pregnancy. She is very experienced, friendly and frank, and would make you feel at ease during the nine months of pregnancy and delivery. She does not recommend unnecessary tests and medications, and tries for a normal delivery. I had a stress free and healthy pregnancy only because of Dr. Praveena.
Though the waiting time was more,Doctor was friendly and adressed our concern and advised us on the next steps with a postive note .
